TestCase.label: TestCase label
TestCase.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'MD_ScopeDescription' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description:
The property with localName 'choice_1' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd/MD_ScopeDescription_Type' must contain one and only one of the following options:
  • other
  • attributes
  • features
  • dataset
  • featureInstances
  • attributeInstances
